bill_title: revise the time period that property classified as nonagricultural acreage shall remain classified as nonagricultural acreage and to provide for the reclassification of certain nonagricultural acreage.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise the time period that property classified as nonagricultural acreage shall remain classified as nonagricultural acreage and to provide for the reclassification of certain nonagricultural acreage. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-6-33.17 be amended to read as follows: 10-6-33.17. Any Except as provided in section 2 of this Act, any land which is classified pursuant to § § 10-6-33.14 to 10-6-33.19, inclusive, shall remain so classified for one year five years . Thereafter, the director of equalization shall reclassify all or part of any land which is classified pursuant to § 10-6-33.14 according to its actual use, provided that any land reclassified as agricultural is consistent with § 10-6-31.3. Land classified pursuant to this section shall be valued for ad valorem tax purposes in the same manner as like property. Section 2. That chapter 10-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If the actual use of all or part of any land which is classified pursuant to § § 10-6-33.14 to 10-6-33.19 is used for owner-occupied dwellings or some other nonagricultural purpose, the director of equalization may reclassify such part of the nonagricultural acreage to its new use at the time the change in use occurs. Land classified pursuant to this section shall be valued for ad valorem tax purposes in the same manner as like property.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
